attributes.action: Give the right to parents to be able to give IV drugs at home and give them training to do so, where the child is on long term medication
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the right for parents to be given the automatic training  to be able to give their own child their medication at home where the child is either is long term sick or just needs long term IV Antibiotics (like Foscarnet) ,, this would avoid the child spending 3 weeks in a hospital Bed each time.... And Families having to be seperated, Also enabeling the child and family to lead a relativly normal life
